title: Australia reduce England to 8-3 as Duckett, Bethell & Crawley fall
summary: England's innings gets off to a horror start, as Australia take three early wickets to leave the visitors on 8-3 inside the first five overs on day one of the foruth Ashes Test in Melbourne.

title: Terrific Tongue's five-wicket haul
summary: Josh Tongue takes five wickets for 45 runs as Australia finish their first innings 152 all out on day one of the fourth Ashes Test in Melbourne.

title: Stokes takes great catch to remove Starc but did Carse bowl no-ball?
summary: Brydon Carse takes the wicket of Mitchell Starc after replays showed the England bowler narrowly avoided his foot being over the line, as Australia fall to 152-8 on day one of the fourth Ashes Test in Melbourne.

title: Carse punishes Green hesitation with direct hit
summary: Cameron Green is made to rue his hesitation between the wickets as the Australian batter is run out by Brydon Carse at the non-striker's end for 17, leaving Australia 143-7 on day one of the fourth Ashes Test in Melbourne.

title: 'That's unbelievable' - Carey fall into England's trap
summary: Ben Stokes takes the wicket of Alex Carey as his ball towards the leg side is played by the Australian batter straight into the hands of Zak Crawley at leg slip as Australia fall to 91-6 on day one of the fourth Ashes Test in Melbourne.

title: 'Absolutely cleans him up!' - Tongue bowls Smith
summary: Josh Tongue takes his third wicket of the innings, dismissing Steve Smith for nine to leave Australia 51-4 on day one of the fourth Ashes Test in Melbourne.

title: Samsung Galaxy Watch4's One UI 8 Watch update rollout expands to more countries
summary: Samsung released the One UI 8 Watch update for the Galaxy Watch4 about a couple of weeks ago, but only in South Korea. title: Head drags on as Atkinson takes early wicket
